medium: Woodblock print (benizuri-e); ink and limited color on paper
title: Ichikawa Benzō as the Page Kichisaburō
description: The actor Ichikawa Benzō as the page Kichisaburō in the play Yaoya Oshichi koi no edozome 八百屋お七恋江戸染, performed at the Nakamura Theater, in the fifth month of 1766
creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
